name: The Seed (Aseel  - Vector)
description:
As a single ant. You can't even reach far beyond the colony. Let alone reach the  "Tree Seed", the greatest challenge any ant can take. But you're not alone. With the help of your fellow ants you'll be able to reach the legendary seed.

CONTROLS :

WASD : move

Space : jump

hold shift : climb

the game lacks sound and cutscenes because I ran out of time. sorry :/
